content: - 150 sts then repeat row 3-4 3 more times - 174 sts then repeat row 7-8 1 more time - 184 sts www elizabethsmithknits com 2 size 6-7 & 7-8 only underarm divide row 1 rs kfb yo sm k2 sm yo *k to marker next row rs *knit to marker remove marker k2 yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * 2 more times kfb of remove next marker transfer sleeve sts onto scrap last st - 46 50 sts yarn using tapestry needle remove marker k2 re- row 2 & all ws row moving forward p to end move next marker repeat from * 1 more time k to end slipping markers as you reach them - 92 96 104 108 112 114 118 sts row 3 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * 3 more times k to end - 54 58 sts body row 5 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * starting on a ws row work in st st flat until body 3 more times k to end - 62 66 sts measures approx 3 75 4 4 25 4 5 4 75 5 5 25 /9 row 7 kfb *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat 10 11 11 12 12 13 cm from underarm divide or from * 3 more times k to last 2 sts kfb k1 - 72 76 approx 2 /5 cm less than desired length ending after sts a ws row cut yarn repeat row 3-8 2 more times - 124 128 sts then repeat row 3-4 3 more times - 148 152 sts next row rs join cc k to end cut yarn then repeat row 7-8 1 more time - 158 162 sts sizes 2t 3t 4t 5-6 yrs 6-7 yrs only then repeat row 3-4 3 more times - 182 186 sts last row ws join mc p to end then repeat row 7-8 1 more time - 192 196 sts sizes 7-8 yrs 8-10 yrs only size 8-10 only last row ws join mc p1 p2tog p to last 3 sts p2tog p1 row 1 rs kfb yo sm k2 sm yo *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * 2 more times kfb of bottom ribbing last st - 50 sts row 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end row 2 & all ws row moving forward p to end repeat row 1 until ribbing measures 2 /5 cm slipping markers as you reach them bobble in pattern row 3 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * 3 more times k to end - 58 sts sleeves repeat for both row 5 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * transfer sleeve sts from scrap yarn onto 3 us 8/5 3 more times k to end - 66 sts mm dpns equally distributing the sts onto the 3 row 7 kfb
